description: A unique identifier for the team the player plays for.
The unique identifier for each team from the data source CBBD scrapes from.
The name of the team the player plays for.
The name of the conference of the player's team.

An integer corresponding to a season of college basketball. CBBD's convention is to use the year in which the championship takes place, so if a game took place in the fall of 2024, the season would be recorded as "2025".
A unique identifier for each player.
The unique identifier for each player from the data source CBBD scrapes from.
The name of the player.
The first name of the player.
The last name of the player.
The jersey number of the player.
The player's position.
The player's height in inches.
The player's weight in pounds.
The player's hometown city.
The player's hometown state.
The player's hometown country, if not located within the United States.
The latitude of the player's hometown city.
The longitude of the player's hometown city.
The FIPS County Code for the player's hometown. For more information, see here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FIPS_county_code
The player's date of birth.
The first season the player began playing NCAA basketball.
The most recent season a player appeared in an NCAA basketball game.
